1.description: The initial rank; 10 LWC locks and 2 spells.

2.description: Use ammeters and light stones. Create hidden switches, light switches, and cooking pots. Several ICs

3.description: Store and place horses. 2 Utility spells; bind and unbind. 2 combat spells; roar and combust.

4.description: Create a town, buy and sell signs. Use the map changer and painting switcher. Several ICs

5.description: Rent shop plots at spawn, use the sign copier and editor, create elevators, various spells

6.description: Start auctions, get glass and bookshelves back when broken, several ICs

7.description: DeviceOn/Off signs, create special pistons and bridges. Two combat spells, two utility spells

8.description: Buy a plot at spawn. Shop Ad in announcements, several ICs.

9.description: XP bottler and toggle deviceitem signs. Several spells.

10.description: 30 LWC locks, create doors and gates. Several Ics and a Commoner title.

13.description: Slot signs, 3 combat spells and a teleportation spell.

15.description: Trade signs and multiple utility spells.

16.description: Resell spawn plots and clock ICs.

18.description: Spawn plot limit increased to 3. Multiplexer ICs.

19.description: Share signs and 4 more utility spells.

20.description: 40 LWC locks and the Citizen Title. 3 more ICs.
